body_html: @stmharry Yes, I'd still say it's a PSU problem. The evidence is pretty much the same. Definitely sounds like an undersized PSU. I bought a Corsair HX750i several weeks ago and since then never again experienced these sudden reboots. So I highly recommend upgrading your PSU to something around at least 700 watts.
